page.title: 05Kingswood Farm _ Cardinham
page.content: Other animals include two sheepdogs to help round up the sheep. One called Fly is 8 years old,the other is called Shep and is being trained. There are also Old English Game fowl for eggs and two horses which the farmer uses to go hunting. There are some traditional buildings these are not very good for housing many animals and are used for rearing calves, stables and for the palour and dairy. The other animals and the hay and corn bins are all in larger modern buildings. For machinery on the farm there are four tractors, a mower, hay bob, plough and five trailers. The farmer employs a contractor for forage harvesting for silage and to combine the barley.
